import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { PaginasService } from '../services/paginas.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-himno', templateUrl: './himno.component.html', styleUrls: ['./himno.component.scss'] }) export class HimnoComponent implements OnInit { letra: string = ""; constructor(private PaginasService: PaginasService) { } ngOnInit() { this.PaginasService.getListado().subscribe((res) => { }); } get resultado() { return this.PaginasService.result; } }
